version_description:
Thank you all for the overwhelming launch support!

This version includes many small bug fixes, including changes to the password reset, UI animations, and those pesky infinite spinners.

Stay tuned for more updates, and thank you again!

Thank you for the continued launch support!

This version includes many small bug fixes and reliability improvements, including fixes to playback, profile and playlist editing, and issues with stale content.

Please stay tuned for more updates, and thank you again for launching with us!

Thank you for the continued launch support!

This version includes many small bug fixes and reliability improvements, including some formatting fixes and an occasional blank screen issue.

Please stay tuned for more updates, and thank you again for launching with us!

Thank you for the continued launch support!

This version includes many small bug fixes and reliability improvements, including some formatting fixes, an occasional blank screen issue, and deep linking.

Please stay tuned for more updates, and thank you again for launching with us!

Thank you for the continued launch support!

This version includes many small bug fixes and reliability improvements, including some formatting fixes, an occasional blank screen issue, and deep linking.

Please stay tuned for more updates, and thank you again for launching with us!
Brand new Explore page! Easily discover new artists with customized playlists built just for you and new collections of tracks to fit any mood.
Improved sign up page, reliability improvements around internet connectivity issues, and bugfixes.
Listen to and share remixes with this latest release!

Audius is always improving! Keep Updates on to make sure you don't miss new features and improvements.
In this version:
- Bug fixes
- Stability improvements
